tidbits.title: Barrier Reef
tidbits.description: Belize boasts the second-largest barrier reef globally, offering exceptional diving opportunities and a diverse marine ecosystem.

tidbits.title: Mayan Heritage
tidbits.description: Belize is rich in Mayan history, with ancient ruins like Caracol and Xunantunich, showcasing the country's significant archaeological sites.

tidbits.title: Rainforest Adventures
tidbits.description: Belize is home to lush rainforests, providing habitats for diverse wildlife, including jaguars and howler monkeys, inviting eco-tourism and exploration.
